name: See No Evil (itch) (FlooK)
description:
You awaken, scared and alone, in a dark dungeon straight out of your nightmares. Monsters, divined from your troubled subconscious, seem to emerge from the void.

Close your eyes to evil and you just might make it out alive...

This is a submission for the Snappy Gurus Game Off | Summer 2022 Game Jam - Theme: Ignorance is Bliss

Developers:

  • Wes (FlooK)
  • Brian (https://brijan825.itch.io/)
  • Isaac

All audio assets acquired from: https://www.zapsplat.com/
